desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleashes up to four attacks in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> and <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct>.
desc.2: After triggering the fourth attack, enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Noblewoman</ct> state.
desc.3: With <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feathers</ct> available, holding <IconNormal /> during the fourth attack will activate the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fluttering Frock</ct> state.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> while in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Noblewoman</ct> state to activate:
desc.1: Dash forward with an attack that deals <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct> and restores 1 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feather</ct> upon hitting an enemy.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: If a Perfect Dodge is triggered during the dash, gain 1 additional <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feather</ct>.
desc.4: If <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feathers</ct> are available after the skill, enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fluttering Frock</ct> state, which can be canceled by holding <IconEvade /> when the skill is used.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> while in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fluttering Frock</ct> state to activate:
desc.1: Attack an area ahead, dealing <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct>.
desc.2: After activation, this skill consumes all <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feathers</ct>, and each one consumed grants 1 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Guard Feather</ct>.
desc.3: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.4: When switching characters during the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fluttering Frock</ct> state, Vivian will automatically perform <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Fluttering Frock - Suspension</ct>.
desc.5: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fluttering Frock</ct> state, press <IconEvade /> to exit the state.

desc.0: After any squad member hits a target with an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, Vivian will consume 1 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Guard Feather</ct> to launch <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Featherbloom</ct> against the target, dealing <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct>, triggering at most once per use of a skill. This effect can trigger even while Vivian is off-field.
desc.1: A maximum of 5 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Guard Feathers</ct> can be stored.

desc.0: Press <IconEvade /> to activate:
desc.1: A quick dash dodge.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a dodge to activate:
desc.1: Launches a forward thrust at enemies in front, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> during a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Launches an attack on enemies ahead, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> and <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: After activating the skill, enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Noblewoman</ct> state.
desc.4: When there are <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feathers</ct> available, hold <IconNormal /> during skill activation to enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fluttering Frock</ct> state.

desc.0: When in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Noblewoman</ct> state and about to be attacked, an automatic dodge will trigger, during which the character will be Invulnerable, but a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</ct> will not be triggered.
desc.1: This can trigger once each time the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Noblewoman</ct> state is entered.

SpecialAttackSongOfSilverWings.name: Special Attack: Song of Silver Wings

desc.0: Press <IconSpecial /> to activate:
desc.1: Quickly attack forward, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> and <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

desc.0: With enough Energy, press <IconSpecialReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Unleash a powerful forward attack that deals massive <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct> and grants 3 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feathers</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: Enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fluttering Frock</ct> state after using the skill. Hold <IconEvade /> during the skill to enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Noblewoman</ct> state.

ChainAttackChorusOfCelestialWings.name: Chain Attack: Chorus of Celestial Wings

desc.0: When a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> is triggered, select the character to activate:
desc.1: Launch a powerful attack on a large area of enemies ahead, dealing massive <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct> and gaining 2 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feathers</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: After the skill activates, enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fluttering Frock</ct> state, which can be canceled by holding <IconEvade /> during the skill.

desc.0: When Decibel Rating is at <ct color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</ct>, press <IconUltimateReady /> to activate:
desc.1: Launch a powerful attack on a large area of enemies ahead, dealing massive <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct> and gaining 5 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feathers</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: After the skill is activated, enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fluttering Frock</ct> state, which can be canceled by holding <IconEvade /> during the skill.

desc.0: When the active character is launched, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Launches an attack on enemies ahead, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> and <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: After the skill activates, enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Noblewoman</ct> state.
desc.4: With <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feathers</ct> available, hold <IconNormal /> during skill activation to enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fluttering Frock</ct> state.

desc.0: When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconSwitch /> to activate:
desc.1: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

desc.0: Press <IconNormal /> after a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</ct> to activate:
desc.1: Launch an attack at enemies ahead, dealing <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct> and gaining 2 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feathers</ct>.
desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
desc.3: After the skill activates enter the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fluttering Frock</ct> state, which can be canceled by holding <IconEvade /> during the skill.

desc.0: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Featherbloom</ct> hits a target that is suffering from an <ct color=#FE437E>Ether</ct>, <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric</ct>, <ct color=#FF5521>Fire</ct>, <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical</ct>, or <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice</ct> Anomaly, it will trigger <ct color=#FFFFFF>Abloom</ct>, dealing additional Attribute Anomaly DMG. The additional DMG is <ct color=#FE437E>3.07%</ct>/<ct color=#2EB6FF>1.6%</ct>/<ct color=#FF5521>4%</ct>/<ct color=#F0D12B>0.37%</ct>/<ct color=#98EFF0>0.54%</ct> per 10 points of Anomaly Proficiency of the original Anomaly DMG.
desc.1: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Fluttering Frock - Suspension</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Featherbloom</ct> hits a target suffering any Attribute Anomaly, it will inflict <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vivian's Prophecy</ct>, causing the target to take <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct> equal to 55% of Vivian's ATK every 0.55s. This DMG can trigger additional DMG from Attribute Anomalies. <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vivian's Prophecy</ct> ends when the target is no longer suffering an Attribute Anomaly.
desc.2: When entering the battlefield, Vivian gains 2 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feathers</ct>.

desc.0: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Featherbloom</ct> hits a target that is suffering from an <ct color=#FE437E>Ether</ct>, <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric</ct>, <ct color=#FF5521>Fire</ct>, <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical</ct>, or <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice</ct> Anomaly, it will trigger <ct color=#FFFFFF>Abloom</ct>, dealing additional Attribute Anomaly DMG. The additional DMG is <ct color=#FE437E>3.59%</ct>/<ct color=#2EB6FF>1.86%</ct>/<ct color=#FF5521>4.66%</ct>/<ct color=#F0D12B>0.44%</ct>/<ct color=#98EFF0>0.63%</ct> per 10 points of Anomaly Proficiency of the original Anomaly DMG.

This DMG can trigger additional DMG from Attribute Anomalies. <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vivian's Prophecy</ct> ends when the target is no longer suffering an Attribute Anomaly.
desc.2: When entering the battlefield, Vivian gains 2 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feathers</ct>.

The additional DMG is <ct color=#FE437E>4.11%</ct>/<ct color=#2EB6FF>2.12%</ct>/<ct color=#FF5521>5.32%</ct>/<ct color=#F0D12B>0.51%</ct>/<ct color=#98EFF0>0.72%</ct> per 10 points of Anomaly Proficiency of the original Anomaly DMG.

This DMG can trigger additional DMG from Attribute Anomalies. <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vivian's Prophecy</ct> ends when the target is no longer suffering an Attribute Anomaly.
desc.2: When entering the battlefield, Vivian gains 2 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feathers</ct>.

The additional DMG is <ct color=#FE437E>4.63%</ct>/<ct color=#2EB6FF>2.38%</ct>/<ct color=#FF5521>5.98%</ct>/<ct color=#F0D12B>0.58%</ct>/<ct color=#98EFF0>0.81%</ct> per 10 points of Anomaly Proficiency of the original Anomaly DMG.

This DMG can trigger additional DMG from Attribute Anomalies. <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vivian's Prophecy</ct> ends when the target is no longer suffering an Attribute Anomaly.
desc.2: When entering the battlefield, Vivian gains 2 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feathers</ct>.

The additional DMG is <ct color=#FE437E>5.15%</ct>/<ct color=#2EB6FF>2.64%</ct>/<ct color=#FF5521>6.64%</ct>/<ct color=#F0D12B>0.65%</ct>/<ct color=#98EFF0>0.9%</ct> per 10 points of Anomaly Proficiency of the original Anomaly DMG.

This DMG can trigger additional DMG from Attribute Anomalies. <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vivian's Prophecy</ct> ends when the target is no longer suffering an Attribute Anomaly.
desc.2: When entering the battlefield, Vivian gains 2 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feathers</ct>.

The additional DMG is <ct color=#FE437E>5.65%</ct>/<ct color=#2EB6FF>2.9%</ct>/<ct color=#FF5521>7.3%</ct>/<ct color=#F0D12B>0.7%</ct>/<ct color=#98EFF0>0.99%</ct> per 10 points of Anomaly Proficiency of the original Anomaly DMG.
desc.1: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Fluttering Frock - Suspension</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Featherbloom</ct> hits a target suffering any Attribute Anomaly, it will inflict <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vivian's Prophecy</ct>, causing the target to take <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct> equal to 55% of Vivian's ATK every 0.55s. This DMG can trigger additional DMG from Attribute Anomalies. <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vivian's Prophecy</ct> ends when the target is no longer suffering an Attribute Anomaly.
desc.2: When entering the battlefield, Vivian gains 2 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feathers</ct>.

desc.0: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Featherbloom</ct> hits a target that is suffering from an <ct color=#FE437E>Ether</ct>, <ct color=#2EB6FF>Electric</ct>, <ct color=#FF5521>Fire</ct>, <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical</ct>, or <ct color=#98EFF0>Ice</ct> Anomaly, it will trigger <ct color=#FFFFFF>Abloom</ct>, dealing additional Attribute Anomaly DMG. The additional DMG is <ct color=#FE437E>6.15%</ct>/<ct color=#2EB6FF>3.2%</ct>/<ct color=#FF5521>8%</ct>/<ct color=#F0D12B>0.75%</ct>/<ct color=#98EFF0>1.08%</ct> per 10 points of Anomaly Proficiency of the original Anomaly DMG.
desc.1: When <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Fluttering Frock - Suspension</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Featherbloom</ct> hits a target suffering any Attribute Anomaly, it will inflict <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vivian's Prophecy</ct>, causing the target to take <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct> equal to 55% of Vivian's ATK every 0.55s. This DMG can trigger additional DMG from Attribute Anomalies. <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vivian's Prophecy</ct> ends when the target is no longer suffering an Attribute Anomaly.
desc.2: When entering the battlefield, Vivian gains 2 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feathers</ct>.

desc.0: When another character in your squad is an <ct color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</ct> character or shares the same attribute:
desc.1: Whenever another squad member applies an Attribute Anomaly to an enemy, Vivian will consume 1 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Guard Feather</ct> to launch <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Featherbloom</ct> on the target. This can trigger once every 0.5s.
desc.2: <ct color=#FE437E>Corruption</ct> DMG dealt by all squad members and the <ct color=#FE437E>Corruption</ct> status' <ct color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</ct> DMG increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>12%</ct>.

1.name: "Walking Into the Orchard in Spring"
1.desc: When a total of 4 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Guard Feathers</ct> are consumed, gain 1 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feather</ct>. All Attribute Anomaly DMG and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</ct> DMG received by targets under <ct color=#FFFFFF>Vivian's Prophecy</ct> increases by 16%.

flavor.0: "Every morning is like our first encounter, every night a reunion."
flavor.1: She had once seen fate's fickleness, with the inevitable ending always tainted by tears.
flavor.2: She no longer wishes to be the prophetic bird of disaster. She's willing to vanish in the fire, sleep in the light, and change your fate with all she has.
flavor.3: So, please don't close the window; the bird will bring you love and carry away death.

2.name: "Stormy Night, Stormy Night"
2.desc: Vivian's <ct color=#FE437E>Ether Anomaly Buildup Rate</ct> increases by 25%. The benefits of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Abloom</ct> from Anomaly Proficiency are raised to 130% of the original value, and 15% of the target's All-Attribute RES is ignored.

flavor.0: "If I had never seen the sun, I could have endured the darkness."
flavor.1: The word "savior" feels too heavy, and "good person" seems too light.
flavor.2: So, perhaps it's better to say, you were once her boatman.
flavor.3: In that storm called malice and self-regret, you were a ray of light, guiding her through the flood.
flavor.4: From that moment on, she could no longer bear the curse or the nightmares. She set out on a journey to find you.

3.name: "Another and the Same"
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: "We measure each other's shadows with the dusk, discovering they completely overlap."
flavor.1: In countless dusks you were unaware of, she watched the same sun set with you, turning the sea into a beautiful warmth.
flavor.2: Amid countless diverging paths, she resolutely chose the one that led to your side.
flavor.3: And today, she finally stands with her shadow overlapping yours.
flavor.4: And today, the sunset remains unchanged.

desc.0: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Fluttering Frock - Suspension</ct> and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Featherbloom</ct> will always CRIT on hit, and they will also increase Vivian's ATK by 12% for 12s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
desc.1: When entering the battlefield, Vivian immediately gains 5 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Guard Feathers</ct>.

flavor.0: "I will lay my true heart, like moonlight, to cover the path beneath your feet."
flavor.1: In chasing after you, she has already formed her own sky.
flavor.2: She is not one of vast love, nor does she have much.
flavor.3: But for you, only for you, she can spill moonlight, cover the darkness, and repair the fractures.
flavor.4: You are her only generosity, her greatest bravery.

5.name: "Sonnet"
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: "Shall I compare thee to a summer's day?"
flavor.1: She is like a bird, flying from late autumn with excitement and anticipation, her wings sweeping across the winter snow. In the spring, she picks a flower and flies straight into the scorching sun of summer.
flavor.2: All because your eyes hide a thousand suns, she loves the fierce sunlight and fears no frost.

6.name: "Vivian"
6.desc: Vivian's <ct color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</ct> increases by 40%. When triggering a Perfect Dodge during <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Noblewoman - Waltz</ct>'s dash, or using <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Violet Requiem</ct>, gain 1 additional <ct color=#FFFFFF>Flight Feather</ct>. Launching <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Fluttering Frock - Suspension</ct> consumes all <ct color=#FFFFFF>Guard Feathers</ct>, the downward attack's area of effect increases, and upon hit, triggers a special instance of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Abloom</ct>. Each additional <ct color=#FFFFFF>Guard Feather</ct> consumed will increase the proportion of additional Anomaly DMG dealt by that instance of <ct color=#FFFFFF>Abloom</ct>, consuming a maximum of 5 <ct color=#FFFFFF>Guard Feathers</ct> to increase the DMG up to a maximum of 5 times the original.

flavor.0: "Vivian is a love poem written only for you."
flavor.1: "We have all the time in the world."
flavor.2: "So, please allow me to write the rest of my life as your footnotes."
